PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06292022-06-02PSPC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Appointing Ernst & Young LLP as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Canada Post Corporation
PrecisOrder appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Appointing Ernst & Young LLP as the Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Canada Post Corporation
precis: Order appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the CANADA Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2022.
